boardgame.name: Catacombs (third edition)
Katakomben
boardgame.description: Catacombs is an award-winning, cooperative board game set in the fantasy world of Cimathue, and you need skill and dexterity to master this fast-paced game._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;One player (the Overseer) marshals an army of monsters while the others choose from six brave heroes who embark on a quest to save the town of Stormtryne from the threat lurking in the catacombs below. As the heroes explore, they must use their abilities, buy items, and recruit allies to help them defeat the monsters before facing the powerful Catacomb Lord, thereby saving the town._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In more detail, in Catacombs players flick wooden discs that represent the monsters and heroes. Contact with an opposing piece inflicts damage, while missiles, spells, and other special abilities can cause other effects. When all of the monsters of a room have been cleared, the heroes can move further into the catacomb._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Items and equipment upgrades can be purchased from the Merchant with gold taken from fallen monsters. The Catacomb Lord is the final danger that the heroes must defeat to win the game. Conversely, the Overseer wins if all of the heroes are defeated._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;This third edition of Catacombs has all-new artwork compared to the earlier editions, but more importantly the keywords from the first two editions has been replace with iconography, the terminology has changed, and the third edition has new shot types, new card effects, and a different set of components (many of which have changed statistics) as well as wall pieces not present in earlier editions._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

All components are immaculate and the games are complete with the noted exception above of there being no box for the expansion. Exclusively stored and played in a smoke free home. Buyer to pay actual shipping - it will be a heavy larger box and will not fit in a flat rate priority mail shipping box. Thank you for looking.

Kickstarter Edition! Components (component list subject to change and improvement) 1 game manual (with expanded content clarifying confusing areas of the original edition) 3 double-sided game boards representing rooms in the catacomb 100+ cards (due to stretch goals being met, the number of cards has increased) plastic/wood coin tokens (due to stretch goals being met) 62 round wooden discs (various sizes) (due to stretch goals being met, the number of wooden pieces will increase) player mats sticker sheet(s) 1 instruction sheet for applying stickers New content and components to be included in the RETAIL box: 3 variant monster cards Sorcerer_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s shield and sticker upgrade (stickers will now be available for wooden pieces that lacked them in the original game) 1 new Item 1 new Antient (advanced feature) New Monsters: Gelatinous Cube (will be an actual wood cube!), Owl Bear, Flame Wraith, plus five monsters in the new Vermin family Monsters designed by the KS community (currently 3) Poison Cards Cure Poison and Giant Fireball spells Ally cards for the base game Heroes (including the optional ones) two optional Heroes: the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;chicken_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; (meant as a light hearted thank you to the fans on the KS comments page) and the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;friendly skeleton_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; Barrier Walls (to prevent discs from leaving the table) Special Room Cards Kickstarter Backers Receive The Following: Access to pledge for the Kickstarter Exclusive Zombie Horde and Chicks In A Catacomb Add-Ons (please scroll down for more details) Also all Kickstarter backers receive the following unlocked exclusives: New Catacomb Lords: The Ice Dragon, The Enchantress and the Behemoth A new Item (we_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re keeping this under wraps) The Ice Mage Hero / Ally NEW DOUBLE SIDED GAME BOARD (_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;the cavern_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; on one side, for the Cavern of Soloth expansion (see below), _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;ice castle_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; on the other) Note: YOU ARE NOT OBLIGATED TO PLEDGE FOR THE SOLOTH EXPANSION TO GET THE EXTRA KS EXCLUSIVE BOARD

(Does include box inserts - not shown in photos) Due to some unfortunate life events, I am forced to sell my board game collection. For several years I was paid to demo games and afterward, had the option of purchasing the game I demo’d. Because of this, most of my games are either new or have been played once. I have a large number of games for sale, some quite small, so please check my inventory to see if you’d like to purchase multiple items. I will work with you a bit on price if you do, and of course, it will save on shipping. I am an eBay top-rates seller with over 4200 positive feedback. I ship promptly and pack the items well. You will not receive beat-up games with pieces thrown all over inside the box. After purchase, buyer will be responsible for exact shipping charges. I accept PayPal only unless prearranged ahead of time.
